 * Snow Tech decides to take a safer route. He goes
the long way around, although safer. Around the
battle. He prays that no one will see him, although he
is in stealth mode, he knows he is more vulnerable in
his robot mode. He transforms back into his beast mode
and stalks around the battle. He is almost there when
he spots a fellow maximal in need. The bot named Prowl
was hit but still fighting. He sighs and transforms
into robot mode. He runs into battle firing his
electric gun at the people that hit Prowl, taking a
few minor hits as he reaches Prowl.*

 " Need help! I do, but my sis says it's a mental
thing."

 * Shadow Cat sees Snow Tech run into battle. She is
furious! He was supposed to go to Iron!*

 " SNOW TECH, YOU DORK! YOU WHERE SUPPOSED TO GO HERE
NOT THERE!!!"

 * She yelled across the battle field to him. Damn he
was stupid! She continued to Iron, making sure she
took no more damage then that to her back. She reaches
her quickly. She begins to fire at the bots firing at
Iron, making sure her shots count. She smiled up at
the larger bot.*

 " thought you needed help, mind if i join, or is this
battle taken?"
